Description:
Required skills to be successful:Complete product knowledge with best trouble shooting skills, overhaul of the Air Winches, Air Tuggers, Man Riders, Hoists, BOP Hoists etc.
Good English communication skills. 
Team player
Self-motivated, takes individual initiative.
Customer-service oriented.What equips you for the role:Minimum 5 to 6 years’ hands ON experience with reputable franchised dealer/ distributor or organization.
Minimum-Diploma / Bachelor’s Engineering Degree in Mechanical / Electrical/Electronics stream.
Experience in Ingersoll Rand Winch & Hoist maintenance and overhauling.
Ingersoll Rand (Certification Trainings)Job Details
